function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible transmission of COVID-19 during the evaluation process","Impact":"Risk of spreading COVID-19 among participants involved in the evaluation process","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, social distancing measures, and regular testing for participants","Technologies":"Use of contactless technology for data collection and virtual evaluation platforms","People":"Participants involved in the evaluation process","Owner":"Organizers of the evaluation process"},{"Description":"Inadequate protection measures for participants during the evaluation process","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to COVID-19 for participants and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Providing personal protective equipment (PPE), ensuring proper ventilation, and limiting the number of participants in enclosed spaces","Technologies":"Air purification systems, temperature screening devices, and wearable proximity sensors","People":"Participants involved in the evaluation process","Owner":"Organizers of the evaluation process"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to distancing and hygiene protocols during post-evaluation discussions","Impact":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 during discussions and interactions following the evaluation process","Mitigation":"Enforcement of distancing measures, provision of hand sanitizing stations, and promoting virtual discussion platforms","Technologies":"Virtual meeting tools, video conferencing software, and contactless communication devices","People":"Participants and stakeholders engaging in post-evaluation discussions","Owner":"Organizers of the post-evaluation discussions"}]}
